animation.title: Animation
animation.description: An animation is a set of keyframes that can be applied to an element.

control.title: Element
control.description: An element is a control that can be added to a screen. It can be a button, a label, an image, etc.

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: The controls that are contained within this element.

A.title: Variable Definition
A.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

anyOf.title: Element reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an element: using the following syntax: [element_name]@[namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Element reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an element: using the following syntax: [namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Variable reference
anyOf.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

D.title: Animation Reset Name
D.description: The name of the animation that will be reset.

G.title: Variable
G.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

F.title: Destroy At End
F.description: If true, the element will be destroyed at the end of the animation.

H.title: Disable Anim Fast Forward
H.description: If true, the animation will not be fast forwarded.

BC.title: End Event
BC.description: The event that will be triggered when the animation ends.

BF.title: Frame Count
BF.description: The number of frames in the animation.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

BH.title: From
BH.description: The starting point of the animation.

BJ.title: Initial UV
BJ.description: The initial UV of the animation.

CA.title: Next
CA.description: The name of the next element.

CB.title: Play Event
CB.description: The event that will be played.

CC.title: Propagate Alpha
CC.description: If true, this element will apply the same alpha value to its controlled element(s).

CD.title: Reversible
CD.description: If true, the animation will be reversible.

CE.title: Scale From Starting Alpha
CE.description: If true, the animation will scale from the starting alpha.

CF.title: To
CF.description: The ending point of the animation.

CI.title: Allow Clipping
CI.description: If true, the element will allow clipping.

CJ.title: Allow Debug Missing Texture
CJ.description: If true, the element will show the black and purple placeholder texture if the referenced image is not found.

DA.title: Allow Scroll Even When Content Fits
DA.description: If true, the element will allow scrolling even when the content fits.

DC.title: Always Handle Pointer
DC.description: If true, the element will always handle the pointer.

DD.title: Always Handle Scrolling
DD.description: If true, the element will always handle scrolling.

DE.title: Always Listen To Input
DE.description: If true, the element will always listen to input.

DF.title: Always Rotate
DF.description: If true, the element will always rotate.

DH.title: Anchor
DH.description: An anchor is a reference to an element in the UI.

DG.title: Anchor From
DG.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

DI.title: Anchor To
DI.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

DJ.title: Animations
DJ.description: The animations that are contained within this element.

EA.title: Background Control
EA.description: The control that will be used for the background.

EB.title: Background Hover Control
EB.description: The control that will be used for the background when hovered.

EC.title: Backup Font Type
EC.description: The type of the backup font.

ED.title: Bilinear
ED.description: If true, the element will use bilinear filtering.

EE.title: Bindings
EE.description: The bindings that are contained within this element.

binding_collection_name.title: Binding Collection Name
binding_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_collection_prefix.title: Binding Collection Prefix
binding_collection_prefix.description: The prefix of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_condition.title: Binding Condition
binding_condition.description: The condition that must be met for the binding to be applied.

binding_name.title: Binding Name
binding_name.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

binding_name_override.title: Binding Name Override
binding_name_override.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

ignored.title: Ignored
ignored.description: If true, the binding will be ignored.

resolve_sibling_scope.title: Resolve Sibling Scope
resolve_sibling_scope.description: If true, the binding will resolve sibling scope.

source_control_name.title: Source Control Name
source_control_name.description: The name of the control that the binding is in.

source_property_name.title: Source Property Name
source_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

target_property_name.title: Target Property Name
target_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

EF.title: Button Mappings
EF.description: The button mappings that are contained within this element.

EG.title: Cache Screen
EG.description: If true, the screen will be cached.

EH.title: Checked Control
EH.description: The control that will be checked.

EI.title: Checked Hover Control
EI.description: The control that will be checked when hovered.

EJ.title: Checked Locked Control
EJ.description: The control that will be checked when locked.

FA.title: Checked Locked Hover Control
FA.description: The control that will be checked when locked and hovered.

FB.title: Clip Direction
FB.description: The direction that the element will be clipped in.

FC.title: Clip Pixel Perfect
FC.description: If true, the element will be clipped pixel perfect.

FD.title: Clips Children
FD.description: If true, the element will clip its children.

FE.title: Close On Player Hurt
FE.description: If true, the element will close when the player is hurt.

FF.title: Collection Index
FF.description: The index of the collection that the element is in.

FG.title: Collection Name
FG.description: The name of the collection that the element is in.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

FH.title: Color
FH.description: The color of the text. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

FJ.title: Consume Hover Events
FJ.description: If true, the element will consume hover events.

GA.title: Contained
GA.description: If true, the element will be contained.

GC.title: Default Control
GC.description: The default control that will be focused.

GD.title: Default Focus Precedence
GD.description: The default focus precedence of the element.

GE.title: Draggable
GE.description: If true, the element will be draggable.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

GF.title: Dropdown Area
GF.description: The area that the dropdown will be in.

GH.title: Dropdown Content Control
GH.description: The control that will be used for the dropdown content.

GJ.title: Enable Directional Toggling
GJ.description: If true, the element will enable directional toggling.

HA.title: Enable Profanity Filter
HA.description: If true, the element will enable the profanity filter.

HB.title: Enabled Newline
HB.description: If true, the element will be enabled when a new line is created.

HC.title: Enabled
HC.description: If true, the element will be enabled.

HE.title: Control IDs
HE.description: The IDs of the controls that will be created by the factory.

HD.title: Factory
HD.description: The factory that will be used to create the element.

control_name.title: Control Name
control_name.description: The name of the control that will be created by the factory.

factory_variables.title: Factory Variables
factory_variables.description: The variables that will be used by the factory.

HF.title: Fill
HF.description: If true, the element will fill the screen.

IA.title: Focus Container
IA.description: If true, the element will be a focus container.

IB.title: Focus Enabled
IB.description: If true, the element will be focus enabled.

IC.title: Focus Identifier
IC.description: The identifier of the element that will be focused.

ID.title: Focus Magnet Enabled
ID.description: If true, the element will be focus magnet enabled.

IF.title: Navigation Mode
IF.description: The navigation mode of the UI.

IE.title: Focus Navigation Mode Down
IE.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating down.

IG.title: Focus Navigation Mode Left
IG.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating left.

IH.title: Focus Navigation Mode Right
IH.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating right.

II.title: Focus Navigation Mode Up
II.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating up.

IJ.title: Focus Wrap Enabled
IJ.description: If true, the element will be focus wrap enabled.

JA.title: Font Scale Factor
JA.description: The scale factor of the font.

JD.title: Force Render Below
JD.description: If true, the element will be rendered below the screen.

JE.title: Force Texture Reload
JE.description: If true, the texture will be reloaded.

JF.title: Grid Dimension Binding
JF.description: The binding that will be used for the grid dimension.

JH.title: Grid Item Template
JH.description: The template that will be used for the grid item.

JJ.title: Grid Rescaling Type
JJ.description: The type of the grid rescaling.

BAA.title: Handle Deselect
BAA.description: If true, the element will handle deselect.

BAB.title: Handle Select
BAB.description: If true, the element will handle select.

BAC.title: Hide Hyphen
BAC.description: If true, the element will hide the hyphen.

BAD.title: Hover Control
BAD.description: The control that will be hovered.

BAE.title: Hover Enabled
BAE.description: If true, the element will be hover enabled.

BAF.title: Ignored
BAF.description: If true, the element will be ignored.

BAG.title: Images
BAG.description: The images that are contained within this element.

BAH.title: Indent Control
BAH.description: The control that will be indented.

BAI.title: Inherit Max Sibling Height
BAI.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum height of its siblings.

BAJ.title: Inherit Max Sibling Width
BAJ.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum width of its siblings.

BBA.title: Is Modal
BBA.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BBB.title: Is Showing Menu
BBB.description: If true, the element will be showing the menu.

BBC.title: Jump To Bottom On Update
BBC.description: If true, the element will jump to the bottom when updated.

BBD.title: Keep Ratio
BBD.description: If true, the element will keep its ratio.

BBE.title: Layer
BBE.description: The layer that the element will be rendered in. Higher layers are rendered on top of lower layers.

BBF.title: Localize
BBF.description: If true, the element will be localized.

BBG.title: Locked Control
BBG.description: The control that will be locked.

BBH.title: Low Frequency Rendering
BBH.description: If true, the element will be rendered at a lower frequency.

BBI.title: Max Length
BBI.description: The maximum length of the text. If the text is longer than this, it will be truncated.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

BBJ.title: Max Size
BBJ.description: The maximum size of the element.

BCB.title: Maximum Grid Items
BCB.description: The maximum number of grid items.

BCC.title: Min Size
BCC.description: The minimum size of the element.

BCD.title: Modal
BCD.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BCG.title: Offset
BCG.description: The offset of the element from the anchor point. horizontal by vertical.

BCI.title: Place Holder Control
BCI.description: The control that will be used for the place holder.

BCJ.title: Pressed Control
BCJ.description: The control that will be pressed.

BDA.title: Prevent Touch Input
BDA.description: If true, touch input will be prevented from passing through this element.

BDB.title: Progress Control
BDB.description: The control that will be used for the progress.

BDC.title: Progress Hover Control
BDC.description: The control that will be used for the progress when hovered.

BDD.title: Property Bag
BDD.description: The property bag that will be used by the element.

BDF.title: Radio Toggle Group
BDF.description: The radio toggle group that the element is in.

BDG.title: Render Game Behind
BDG.description: If true, the game will be rendered behind the element.

BDH.title: Render Only When Topmost
BDH.description: If true, the element will only be rendered when it is the topmost element.

BDI.title: Renderer
BDI.description: The renderer that will be used by the element.

BDJ.title: Reset Event
BDJ.description: The event that will be reset.

BEA.title: Reset On Focus Lost
BEA.description: If true, the element will be reset when focus is lost.

BEB.title: Rotate Speed
BEB.description: The speed that the element will rotate at.

BEC.title: Screen Draws Last
BEC.description: If true, the screen will be drawn last.

BED.title: Screen Not Flushable
BED.description: If true, the screen will not be flushed when the element is added.

BEE.title: Scroll Box And Track Panel
BEE.description: The panel that will be used for the scroll box and track.

BEF.title: Scroll Content
BEF.description: The content that will be scrolled.

BEG.title: Scroll Speed
BEG.description: The speed that the element will scroll at.

BEH.title: Scroll View Port
BEH.description: The view port that the element will be scrolled in.

BEJ.title: Scrollbar Touch Button
BEJ.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar touch.

BFA.title: Scrollbar Track Button
BFA.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar track.

BFC.title: Send Telemetry
BFC.description: If true, the element will send telemetry.

BFD.title: Shadow
BFD.description: If true, the text will have a shadow.

BFE.title: Should Steal Mouse
BFE.description: If true, the element will steal the mouse.

BFG.title: Slider Box Control
BFG.description: The control that will be used for the slider box.

BFH.title: Slider Collection Name
BFH.description: The name of the collection that the slider is in.

BFI.title: Slider Deselected Button
BFI.description: The button that will be used for the slider deselected.

BGB.title: Slider Select On Hover
BGB.description: If true, the slider will select on hover.

BGC.title: Slider Selected Button
BGC.description: The button that will be used for the slider selected.

BGD.title: Slider Small Decrease Button
BGD.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BGE.title: Slider Small Increase Button
BGE.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BGG.title: Slider Track Button
BGG.description: The button that will be used for the slider track.

BHB.title: Text Box Name
BHB.description: The name of the text box.

BHC.title: Text Control
BHC.description: The control that will be used for the text.

BHD.title: Text Edit Box Grid Collection Name
BHD.description: The name of the collection that the text edit box grid is in.

BHH.title: Texture File System
BHH.description: The file system that the texture is in.

BHJ.title: Tiled
BHJ.description: If true, the texture will be tiled.

BIA.title: Toggle Default State
BIA.description: The default state of the toggle.

BIB.title: Toggle Grid Collection Name
BIB.description: The name of the collection that the toggle grid is in.

BIC.title: Toggle Group Default Selected
BIC.description: The default selected toggle of the toggle group.

BID.title: Toggle Group Forced Index
BID.description: The forced index of the toggle group.

BIF.title: Toggle Off Button
BIF.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BIG.title: Toggle On Button
BIG.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BIH.title: Touch Mode
BIH.description: The touch mode of the element.

BII.title: TTS Control Header
BII.description: The header of the TTS control.

BIJ.title: TTS Control Type Order Priority
BIJ.description: The priority of the TTS control type order.

BJB.title: TTS Ignore Subsections
BJB.description: If true, the element will ignore subsections.

BJC.title: TTS Index Priority
BJC.description: The priority of the TTS index.

BJD.title: TTS Inherit Siblings
BJD.description: If true, the element will inherit its siblings.

BJF.title: TTS Override Control Value
BJF.description: If true, the TTS will override the control value.

BJG.title: TTS Section Header
BJG.description: The header of the TTS section.

BJH.title: TTS Toggle Off
BJH.description: If true, the TTS will toggle off.

BJI.title: TTS Toggle On
BJI.description: If true, the TTS will toggle on.

BJJ.title: TTS Value Changed
BJJ.description: If true, the TTS value will change.

CAA.title: TTS Value Order Priority
CAA.description: The priority of the TTS value order.

CAD.title: Unchecked Control
CAD.description: The control that will be unchecked.

CAE.title: Unchecked Hover Control
CAE.description: The control that will be unchecked when hovered.

CAF.title: Unchecked Locked Control
CAF.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked.

CAG.title: Unchecked Locked Hover Control
CAG.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked and hovered.

CAH.title: Use Anchored Offset
CAH.description: If true, the element will use the anchored offset.

CAI.title: Use Child Anchors
CAI.description: If true, this element will stack its controlled element in respect to their anchor values.

CAJ.title: Use Last Focus
CAJ.description: If true, the element will use the last focus.

CBA_variables.title: Variable Definition
CBA_variables.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

CBA.title: Variables
CBA.description: The variables that are contained within this element.

CBB.title: Virtual Keyboard Buffer Control
CBB.description: The control that will be used for the virtual keyboard buffer.

CBC.title: Visible
CBC.description: If true, the element will be visible.

CBD.title: Zip Folder
CBD.description: The folder that the element will be zipped into.
